content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like supermarkets, public transportation, etc. Now, I'm sure you understand that a property like this doesn't come cheap. Let's start with a price of 1500 Euros. Remember, my goal is to get the highest price possible, so let's see how much you're willing to pay.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and I have to buy furniture, I am willing to rent it for 1200 Euros. I can also sign a two-year contract.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but 1200 Euros is quite low considering the location and amenities. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the best price for my property. Let's try 1400 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. But as I said, I have to buy furniture and I don't want to overstretch my budget. 1250 Euros sounds more reasonable. I can also pay six months in advance.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, 1250 Euros is still too low for me. Considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I think 1350 Euros is more reasonable. Remember, I'm trying to get the best price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, Mister Schmidt. However, I also have to consider my budget. 1300 Euros is my final offer. I am a responsible and dependable person, and I will pay the rent on time every month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your final offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, 1300 Euros is still not enough for me. Considering the quality of the apartment and its location, I think 1350 Euros is a more reasonable price. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the best price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. However, I don't want to overstretch my budget. 1300 Euros is the highest I can pay. I am a smart person and I can find an apartment elsewhere if I have to.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but I'm afraid 1300 Euros is too low for me. I want to get the best price for my property, and 1350 Euros is more reasonable considering the quality of the apartment and its location. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not willing to increase your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to meet my price. 'TERMINATE'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
